app_descript:
App Name: Walmart Pharmacy

Brief

Walmart Pharmacy provides a convenient and user-friendly platform for managing your prescriptions. You can easily request refills, involve family members or caregivers in your medication management, and schedule pick-ups at your convenience. The app also keeps you informed with notifications when your prescriptions are ready.

Pricing ğŸ’µ

Download and take control of your pharmacy needs with the Walmart Pharmacy app today!
